puzzle.title: A Mixtape of Ice & Fire
puzzle.hint: Determine the artist for each song. (Next hint will give the correct ordering.)

The artists are:
1. Jerry Lee Lewis 2. Billy Joel 3. Outkast 4. Alicia Keys 5. Vanilla Ice 6. Adele 7. Johnny Cash 8. Foreigner 9. The Doors 10. James Taylor
Now what can you do with the track times?
Use the minute of the track time to index into the artist's name and extract a single letter. Then use the seconds of the track time is to shift that letter...but what way should you shift?

For songs with "fire" ("hot jams..."), add to shift forward ("...of the future") in the alphabet. For songs with "ice" ("cool grooves..."), subtract to shift backward ("...of the past"). For example: track 1 indexes to the 2nd letter (E) of "Jerry Lee Lewis" and because it mentions "fire," shifts that letter forward by 11 to get P.
The solution is PUZZLE KING.

puzzle.title: Melisandre's Missive
puzzle.hint: Have you noticed the misspelled words?
There are 3 kinds of misspellings
Some words are missing a letter, some have an extra letter, and some have a changed letter
Partial Solution: Missing letters spell out AFTER, Additional letters spell out EVERY, Changed letters spell out COMMA
Take each letter after every comma in the letter
